alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 7:18PM EST until December 16 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Areas of freezing rain and freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze, mainly on the ridges and in the higher elevations. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, northwest and western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible if untreated. Tree damage and power outages remain possible due to ice which has accumulated through the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett
